website_summaries.verdict: This 3 flavor variety pack is a good choice for those with picky pets, but check the packets carefully when they arrive for freshness.
pros: 3 flavor sampler packs have 4 ounces each of turkey, beef, and lamb treats
Made in the USA from 100% meat, with no preservatives or additives
cons: Some reports of these arriving with one of the packets rancid
These treats disagreed with some pets (ex

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic treats even for cats!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic for training treats that I keep all over the home in various air-tight jars. I appreciate that they're 100% raw meat with no preservatives or added fillers. These are perfect supplement for when you're on the road with your cat (yes, I have adventure cats who travel by car, plane, bicycle or motorcycle) so I need something to tide them over during our day-trips in between their fresh raw meals which are extremely challenging to transport. I always look for 100% raw treats for my cats so that I have a variety for them to consume and Sojos is one of the few my cats really enjoy; this coming from super fussy eaters!
customer_reviews.author: Weekly Whiskers

customer_reviews.title: 100% meat training treats for picky eaters!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs go crazy for these. I've gone to the dog park with these treats in pocket and been stalked by diff dogs sniffing around too find. We have a very picky eater, Chihuahua mix, and he is usually hesitant about new foods. This is one of the best training treating treats with pure and natural ingredients. He is on a whole prey diet so it's very hard to find great treats with quality ingredients, with actually, 100% meat. Another thing to know is they are not all the same sizes. This doesn't bother me at all still in smaller pieces no larger than ~ 1 inch. Love!!
customer_reviews.author: KAY07

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 month old border collie who is beginning training for a variety of dog sports as well as general good puppy manners. These treats are the perfect size to reward without distracting, excellent alternative to bad for you biscuits, apparently taste great, and don't crumble too bad in my pockets. They smell enough so she knows I have them even when she can't see them, but not overpowering. Even my picky chihuahua loves them. Also excellent for use in treat dispensing toys when regular dry food isn't motivating enough to work/play with it for.
customer_reviews.author: Mia GulanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!
customer_reviews.text: These are great treats for a pretty good price. These treats work for my dogs that "aren't food motivated". I had a client who couldn't get her dog to "drop" the tennis ball. He's a big german shepherd, you can't take things away from him. Anyway, I was using these treats and working with him on trading the ball for the treat, and he was doing it! Later, the owner comes to me and tells me that usually he's not food motivated. He just needed some really "high value" treats! Dog's go crazy over these!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria AndrewsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I think it's funny the Amazon review requests my disposition on flavor... I didn't try them but my sweet pup loves them! :) My dog has an extremely sensitive tummy and some allergies so I'm very careful about what I give him. He loves these and hasn't had any trouble. I wish they were bigger pieces but most freeze dried raw treats are exactly like this (some chunks, some small pieces and some bits).
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great For Raw Fed Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Our Rottweiler is raw fed and I was looking at getting some new treats for him to use while training. He goes crazy for these and really wants to work for them. I recommend giving these treats a shot especially if your dog is raw fed and your looking for a treat that is quick and easy. All three different proteins have not caused my dog any digestion issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: 85% chunks of dried fat!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so dissapointed!!! After receiving a venison sample in my barkbox I decided to try the different flavors: turkey, beef, and lamb. Each bag is 85% pieces of dried fat! So gross, unhealthy and my dogs don't eat it!
customer_reviews.author: morkies Mom

customer_reviews.title: Dogs go crazy for these Treats!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go BONKERS over these treats! I have to have plenty stocked up. Quick bites so they are good for training, and the dogs consider them high reward so these treats get their attention promptly. Love that they are natural and healthy for the pups!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super yummy
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs LOVE this treat. My older dog is not good motivated at all and will usually refuse treats, even she gets excited about these! My vet has concerns about there treats being raw and freeze dried, but I have been happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ember

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money!
customer_reviews.text: My Golden Retriever is a little over 3months. He loves these more then any other treat. He does everything I say With no fuss! Great right! He loves all of them. Bag was full to the rim unlike when I purchased it at Chow Hound.
customer_reviews.author: EMarie

customer_reviews.title: healthy, low calorie, cats like them, too
customer_reviews.text: Good deal on these healthy treats. My dog and cats all love them, and I don't worry about them. They are the perfect size to hide around the house before I leave to go somewhere, then they all search for them and are excited for me to go to work!
customer_reviews.author: MissK

customer_reviews.title: Finally a healthy treat for fussy girl!!!
customer_reviews.text: My very fussy 7+ y/oHava-Tsu absolutely LOVED these treats!! I just received these along with cat items and she patiently waited for hers!! I am SOOO happy to find a really healthy treat she likes!! Just tried the Turkey!
customer_reviews.author: MEGAN K. DE GRAAF

customer_reviews.title: Crushed, moist junk.
customer_reviews.text: If you want something crushed to put on your dog food you may like this. They were too small to use as treats. I got crumbs in all 3 bags. Won’t ever waste my money on this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and most of them are in tact other than the last little bit. They are true ingredients and easy to use on walks without giving too many and getting the dog fat.
customer_reviews.author: skyeeeo

customer_reviews.title: No preservatives
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd has serious itching problems when she gets commercially made dog treats, chicken strips, dog biscuits, etc......some preservatives or additives seem to trigger the problem. Sojos is just meat, nothing else added. She loves the treats and NO itching, win, win !!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Z

customer_reviews.title: Really great treats, I bought a 2nd order....
customer_reviews.text: These are small pieces, a great size for treats. My dog loved it so much that I bought another batch. I also gave away 2 bags to friends with dogs.
customer_reviews.author: honolulufamily

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves Sojo's,especially these treat. They usually cost around $10/bag at the pet store. Me and my pup are both happy with the purchase. Plus they last a long time when you have a small pup.
customer_reviews.author: eml

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these but keep in mind they are to be used on occasion. They got my baby sick after inhaling too many of them in one day.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Freeze Dried Dog Treats
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy absolutely loves these treats. We use them for training and she will do just about anything to get one of these treats. I like the convenience of the freeze dried and the ease of using it. The only drawback that I see is the much higher price than ordinary dog trats.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry J. Marble

customer_reviews.title: Our trainer introduced us to these!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog trainer introduced us to these. Our dog is really picky and he cannot get enough of these. I have ordered them several times and will continue to order.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: My TwinkleBelles Says High Four 🐾
customer_reviews.text: My little Maltese, TwinkleBelles, loves them and they are 100% meat without weird things and that's all that matters 😁
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: My dog goes nuts for these
customer_reviews.text: How do you give a good that I wouldn't put within 5 feet of my mouth five stars? Just ask the dog! He goes crazy for these and because they don't have any fillers or garbage in them, I don't mind giving them to him. Change up the flavors here and there as dogs are known to get bored of almost anything. Human food could learn a lot from how few ingredients these have...
customer_reviews.author: GDP

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for a ferret. Big Fan!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my girlfriend's ferret, who appears to like them very much. I just wish the packaging was recyclable.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Harris

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats. They go crazy over every flavor! My cats are all raw fed so having a treat I can give them that is only meat is great. I am on my third round of ordering this 3 pack. I also order the goat treats. All flavors have some chunks that are a bit large for the cats but I just break them apart
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: One of three bags is rancid; not worth buying as a three pack
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product (all three flavors) separately from other vendors in the past, and they have all been fine. The turkey packet in this three-pack was rancid (I didn't read the other reviews before I purchased; seems like there's a bad batch issue going on here), so if you think you're getting a deal, the price per bag is actually more expensive when you account for the fact that you have to throw away the turkey one.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: All Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: A dog trainer recommended these, and boy was she right! We keep extra around for the neighborhood dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Treats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my Terrier mix since she likes treats but is on a diet. Freeze dried were recommended to help her with her weight loss. They are a decent size, though I think one(turkey maybe?) was a bit tiny. She loves them and I feel good about giving them to her.
customer_reviews.author: B. Feely

customer_reviews.title: I feed them a great dehydrated raw dog food and they love it
customer_reviews.text: I have Pomeranians who are picky, picky, picky. I feed them a great dehydrated raw dog food and they love it, but get finicky now and then. All I have to do then, is sprinkle some of this on top of their dog food and without fail, they start eating, first the treats, and then the food. WOOT!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Glass

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like, I don’t.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like these, but I won’t be buying them again. Too many chunks of just fat. Not great for them...
customer_reviews.author: Takeetah

customer_reviews.title: Best Training Treats!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite dog training treats being light weight, dehydrated raw meat pieces. They are healthy single ingredient treats with 3 great meats for your pup to choose from. I love to keep a bag in my car, because I never know what my dogs and I will be up to next!
customer_reviews.author: LibbyMK

customer_reviews.title: He loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves, loves, loves these treats. Better than any other treat I have given him.
customer_reviews.author: cbc

customer_reviews.title: Pupper favorite
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because my pup goes NUTS over these treats. Luckily he’s an 11/10 good boy and will get through these bags before their Best By date. One bag gave me about 2 weeks, the others about a month. I’m not terribly happy about how long it took to fill the order and ship to me.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A.

customer_reviews.title: Great treats that last a while
customer_reviews.text: I (and my dog) love these treats! Nicely sized, easy to manage, and having the 3 pack means you can mix them up so they retain their novelty.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Garabedian

customer_reviews.title: Treats. They’re a little pricey but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the Treats. They’re a little pricey but worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Mc Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats mainly dehydrated foods and his treats were Bravo roasted venison liver, but their slicing of the venison left a lot to be desired, too thick and my old boy ccouldn't chew them. These are perfect, he loves them, can chew them, and they last a lot longer than the bravo.
customer_reviews.author: lisa martha

customer_reviews.title: Do your pups a favor!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t vouch much for the taste since I’m not brave enough to try to dog treats, but my pups love them! Also, super easy for them to get down since they are both older and lack a bit in the tooth department. I can get them to do just about when I dangle some of these in their face!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Favorite treats
customer_reviews.text: This is my dog's favorite. She is super picky and doesn't have a pattern on what treats she likes and isnt food driven so it's tough to buy for her. We first got these at Zoom Room for training and she is obsessed! Super healthy and perfect sized pieces for training. Great price for 3 packages as well here.
customer_reviews.author: Lorreen Serls

customer_reviews.title: Great little treats my dog enjoys
customer_reviews.text: Great little treats my dog enjoys. I like that they are pure meat and are easy to toss in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Terry T

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old pup has enjoyed these treats for 2 months. I cut the pieces very small so each bag will go a long time before replacing.
customer_reviews.author: ALH

customer_reviews.title: Pup really likes this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: And great value too! Updated: already my 4th purchase! Dog loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Healthy Treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. He is very picky and never turns these down.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Lover

customer_reviews.title: They are so handy and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: My little Chihuahua loves them so they are a wonderful training treat
customer_reviews.author: elsie405

customer_reviews.title: Pup likes the taste, but they are really small ...
customer_reviews.text: Pup likes the taste, but they are really small chunks for the most part. Lamb and beef were really fatty too.
customer_reviews.author: JoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Sojos Dog Food Treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved these treats - very good for elderly pets since freeze dried and easy to eat - would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy lives these and they have been very helpful with his training!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our dog’s favorite
customer_reviews.text: We used them for Christmas gifts for our friends with dogs. Plus our dogs love them too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these. Sometimes I put these on ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. Sometimes I put these on his food to get him to eat or put bone broth on them for his food.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: My dog’s absolute favorite and pure protein
customer_reviews.text: Safe, one ingredient, and she loves them! Great treat that she will do tricks for.
customer_reviews.author: Gilly

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! I like that I am only giving her meat and there are no fillers or added products that are not good for her.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Berger

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Tasty
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats! They aren’t extremely expensive and are a much healthier alternative.
customer_reviews.author: AND

customer_reviews.title: Frenchie Approved.
customer_reviews.text: My Frenchie is very particular on what type of treats she will eat and she absolutely loves these. I also do not feel guilty feeding her these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My labradoodle will not eat these...Walks away. I am sorry to say. Hope others have a different experience.
customer_reviews.author: twa

customer_reviews.title: My animals love these things!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs and cats love these things. Very rich. Have to be careful not to give them too much in one sitting or they'll throw them up--the cats especially. Love all the flavors but partial to Lamb.
customer_reviews.author: Morrie

customer_reviews.title: My two dogs go ape over these!
customer_reviews.text: My two small dogs love all three flavors and really go nuts over the lamb. These are high quality, don't smell, and a bag goes a long way. I'll definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorites!
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love them. They seem to prefer the beef to the lamb and turkey but they're never turn their noses up at any of them!
customer_reviews.author: Three Dog Circus

customer_reviews.title: My dogs can not get enough of these. They'll ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs can not get enough of these. They'll stare at the bag all day if I leave it out. The packages may contain a few fatty pieces but it has never been so much that I've felt cheated out of my money. I buy these regularly and will likely continue to do so for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ramos

customer_reviews.title: A favorite with my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this product. She has tried each of the different flavors and loves them equally as a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great treats for the dogs
customer_reviews.text: great treats for sneaking in medicine - our dogs think these treats are the absolute best and they are healthy as well as tasty
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C Mache

customer_reviews.title: They love them! We're glad to know that they are ...
customer_reviews.text: We have given these treats to our pups since we got them from the breeder. They love them! We're glad to know that they are 100% meat.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!! I will never buy a different brand of dog treats.
customer_reviews.author: ah

customer_reviews.title: Only dog treats you need
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dog treats, big chunks so you can break them down. They don’t last long tho since our Klee Kai loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sojos is a great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Sojos is a great product overall. However, the company who sent me this had inferior quality. These treats usually has a little moist in them, but these were super dry and gave my pup the runs. I suggest to try another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Eskimogall

customer_reviews.title: Great Treats for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them, I love them! will buy it again if available
customer_reviews.author: Arabian Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Cat and small dog approved!
customer_reviews.text: Our small dogs and our cats, love these as treats!

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 month old puppy loves all of the flavors. Pricier than other treats but 100% meat.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Willmott

customer_reviews.title: Bags came with treats completely crushed
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats, however this set came completely crushed and so small it's similar to powder. I'm extremely upset as I needed more training treats as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the Lamb, didnt care for the Goat & was so so on the Turkey
customer_reviews.author: Jodi S

customer_reviews.title: My puppy LOVES em
customer_reviews.text: Puppy loves em. Cut up into smaller pieces to maximize.

customer_reviews.title: My Dog's Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My picky eater absolutely LOVES these treats! She'd eat them as a meal if I'd let her!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like doggie candy!! Pure meat. They will do anything for this!!

customer_reviews.title: 100% natural and great for sprinkling on top of dry food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go-to treat. 100% natural and great for sprinkling on top of dry food. We also use as training treats since they are small.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Cavender

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My fussy pooch loves these!! Got them in the BarkBox and will continue to buy them!

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Approves
customer_reviews.text: They are the only treat my dog will eat. He loves them.

customer_reviews.title: These all natural treats a wonderful addition to my Yorkie's favorites
customer_reviews.text: These all natural treats a wonderful addition to my Yorkie's favorites. They are easy to break so you can give more! My dog loves them!!

customer_reviews.title: MY DOGS LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Just buy them, now. Your dogs will be forever stuck to you!

customer_reviews.title: Yummy treats

customer_reviews.text: French bulldog loves these snacks. soft and small good for puppy training

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bougt as gift for a Labrador and he loves this treat.

customer_reviews.title: YOUR DOG WILL LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES these. It is raw meat, so wash your hands after handling it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved them! Worked great as high value training treat
customer_reviews.text: Dog loved them! Worked great as high value training treat.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Couple

customer_reviews.title: An actual healthy treat...
customer_reviews.text: I don't feed many "dog treats" since so many have terrible ingredients. But this is simply freeze dried meat. Perfect! And the dogs love them as training treats. On occasion I've just added them to food too. My dogs eat raw and I hate giving them junk food for training so I'm glad to have a healthy and easy option. This combo pack is a great deal pricewise too. It's a lot of treats between all three packs. During a whole training class I don't go through half a pack. I do wish they were a hair larger for big dogs but they are still okay.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these. I sprinkle a hand full ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these . I sprinkle a hand full over her food at night .
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Dsneas

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Great treats - they're healthy and natural. My dog loves them!

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog lives for them and they are good for him.

customer_reviews.text: my doggie didn't like it, but I gave them to my Boss's dog and he loved them ....

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and I like feeding her real meat vs. biscuits and other processed treats.

customer_reviews.title: Dog treats
customer_reviews.text: The turkey is great ,the lamb was to rich for my dog

product_meta.title: Sojos 100% Raw Freeze-Dried Meat Treats For Dogs 3 Flavor Variety Bundle: (1) Sojos Simply Beef 100% Raw Freeze-Dried Beef Treats, (1) Sojos Simply Lamb 100% Raw Freeze-Dried Lamb Treats, and (1) Sojos Simply Turkey 100% Raw Freeze-Dried Turkey Treats, 4 O
product_meta.description: Open a box and indulge your 4-legged pal with a delicious experience - conveniently packaged as a 3 flavor assortment!
feature_bullets: Convenient 3 flavor sampler - One bag of each
